snippet.title: Ghost in the Shell (PS1) - Gameplay (1080p)
snippet.description:
It's been a year exactly since i made a Walkthrough of this old PlayStation 1 game, so, i decided to make a new short video about this particular game i enjoy a lot, in 1080p this time around, featuring the following two Intros and the first two Levels (Gameplay Recorded in 16:9),

Game Description: Ghost in the Shell (PS1) - Gameplay (1080p)

- Ghost in the Shell is a game based on both the Cyberpunk Anime/Film of the same name and the Manga by Masamune Shirow,
- The game's gameplay mechanics share a mix of Action, TPS/FPS (First and Third-Person cameras are available and switchable In-Game) and Car Combat, with the futuristic twist thanks to our Vehicle/Tank abilities to jump and climb walls,
- Even though the game's  positive reception, Ghost in the Shell (PS1) is quite rare; Having in consideration the PlayStation's limitations, the game stands out by presenting extremely detailed environments, characters and vehicles, presenting a nice variety of levels and high replay value as well,
